exception.message: The following asserts failed: filter '10% off or more' not found in product details. ------------------------------------------------------------- Title: lava bold n1 pro (stealth black, 4 gb ram, 128 gb storage)| bigger 6.67" hd+ ip54 display | 120 hz refresh rate | 50 mp ai triple rear camera | 8 mp front camera| 5000 mah battery| charger in box Key Features: brand lava operating system android 14 ram memory installed size 4 gb cpu model others cpu speed 2.4 ghz About: about this item capture stunning photos with a 50mp ai triple camera for detailed, vibrant shots, and an 8mp selfie camera for clear, enhanced self-portraits. perfect for wide-angle, portrait, and low-light photography. enjoy seamless multitasking with 4gb ram and 4gb expandable ram, ensuring smooth performance. with up to 128 gb storage, store more apps, photos, and videos without compromising speed or efficiency. experience lag-free gaming and smooth performance with the powerful octa-core processor. enjoy faster speeds and responsive graphics, ensuring an immersive and uninterrupted gaming and app experience. enjoy vibrant visuals on the 6.67" hd+ display with ip54 rating (dust & water resistant), offering ultra-clear resolution and stunning colors. perfect for watching videos, gaming, and browsing with crisp detail and enhanced viewing clarity. clean android (no bloatware, no ads) | in-display fingerprint sensor › see more product details Tech Details: lava bold n1 pro mobile phone information technical details os android 14 product dimensions 16.58 x 7.72 x 0.83 cm; 202 g batteries 1 lithium polymer batteries required.
